actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the amount deductible in the case of casualty losses of timber.

summary.text: Sets forth a formula for determining the amount deductible in the case of casualty losses of timber under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the amount deductible in the case of casualty losses of timber.
